direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve comparing or copying the state of the object, though they serve different purposes.
Both methods involve operations on the internal state of the object (flags) and have similar control flows.
Both methods provide a way to represent the internal state of the object, though one is for cloning and the other for textual representation.
Both methods modify the internal state of the object, though one is for cloning and the other for resetting flags.
Both methods modify the internal state of the object, though one is for cloning and the other for setting all flags.
